Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' across all cases
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants that start with 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that are immediately followed by 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurring before 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that appear in variants leading to 'SW-EIC Accept'
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' in cases that eventually include 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants containing 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that also contain at least one reviewer-related activity (e.g., 'SW-Reviewer Agreed', 'SW-Reviewer Declined', or 'SW-Reviewer No Response')
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Ratio of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' to 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' in the entire log
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' is directly followed by a plagiarism-related activity ('Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' or 'Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded')
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that occur in variants ending with a final decision (e.g., 'SW-EIC Accept', 'SW-EIC Reject', 'SW-EIC Major Revision', 'SW-EIC Minor Revision', or 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit')
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' compared to the total number of checklist-related activities (e.g., 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion', 'SW-Checklist Completed')
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants where 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' appears more than once (indicating possible resubmissions or system reprocessing)
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that are not followed by any revision-related activities (e.g., 'SWâ€“Major Revision due in 1 week', 'RW-Initial Reviewer Selection')
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' per month to identify submission seasonality
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities
